infotexts.afflictiondescription.af_calyxanide: You should not be able to see this.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.surgery_huskhealth: The parasite is no longer moving, but it's still there. Now's the time to pull it out.
You've weakened the parasite, but will it be enough...?
You can see an undulating mass of tentacles. Watch out, it might lash out at you.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.bonecuttorso: The ribs have been sawed, allowing for a clearer view into the patients torso.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.husklamp: The invigorating vapors linger in your nostrils.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.huskstasis: It seems their symbiote is moving heaven and hell to keep them alive.
